description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe that defines how to fetch, configure, build, and install the OpenSSL library within a Yocto/OE build environment. It contains metadata, dependencies, build configuration, and custom functions specific to OpenSSL integration.

methods.name: openssl_replace_absolute_symlinks
methods.description: Replaces absolute symlinks within the specified base directory with relative ones to avoid build errors related to absolute symlinks.

methods.name: install_relative_symlinks
methods.description: Invokes openssl_replace_absolute_symlinks on the build directory to perform the symlink adjustment post-install.
